"Xiera": "We've collected enough Mana! With this, you should be able to summon the Buster Pile!"

"<%me>!
It seems the enemy's assault has begun! Let's concentrate on protecting the Buster Tower!"

"The Defense Phase is when players defend the
Buster Tower from enemy attacks. Players can
choose to defeat the enemies that appear or
defend until the phase has ended.

Each time a Phase progresses, the difficulty
increases."

"Enemies that appear during the Defense Phase
will be transferred to the Buster Tower over time.

Enemies will change appearance before
they are transferred. Please keep an eye
out for them."
"The enemy army is in front of you! Careful!"
